name: alphabet soup (Crawlspace)
description:
A light puzzle game where you make your food, and then play with it too. 

Become a Master Chef as you play through 8 handcrafted puzzles. I can say for a fact you'll become  a master chef because I watched 2 whole episodes while making this thing!

Chill out in the zen mode. Cook whatever you want. THE KITCHEN IS YOURS. 

"Don't play with your food" - your parents, probably
"wtf is this stupid game" - Gordon Ramsey, if he ever played this game ~ ~ ~ ~ GMTK Jam 2018 ~ ~ ~ ~

Made for the 2018 Game Maker's Toolkit jam in 48 hours. 

The theme was 'genre without mechanic', and this is a cooking game with food. 

~ ~ ~ ~ CONTROLS ~ ~ ~ ~ 

keyboard - type out 'food'

return - create 'food'

mouse drag - drag 'food' around

mouse click - menus and buttons

~ ~ ~ ~ CREDITS ~ ~ ~ ~ ~

programming and art - @small_signs

some music - Benjamin Cauley

~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~

thanks for playing!

crawlspace ~ 2018
